TextBlock.Text: LEADER OF GREED: This is a note directed to anyone who may be passing by this place of interest.

LEADER OF GREED: The entrance to this building appears to close whenever someone approaches with excessive technology. I would recommend removing your suit and any other pieces of technology before attempting to enter.
LEADER OF GREED: Otherwise, you may run into the issue of passing through a solid and very tightly shut door.
LEADER OF GREED: After further testing, I can conclude that the door is not affected by larger technological equipment, as the door remains open when my shuttle is landed near it.
